descripcion:
This formulation is produced specially for the nutritional needs of Bentgrass. A superb fertilizer for greens, tees, and fairways. The nutrition package in this formula helps Bentgrass tolerate heavy traffic, and frequent mowing.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Urea, Ammonium Phosphate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL ACIDITY: 760 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.

SOLUBILITY (max.): 2 lbs per gallon in cold water. Hot water and agitation improve solubility.
informacionTecnica:

1.0% Ammoniacal Nitrogen
4.8% Nitrate Nitrogen
22.2% Urea Nitrogen
Available Phosphate (P2O5) 8%
Soluble Potash (K2O) 18%
Boron (B) 0.01%
Copper (Cu) 0.01%
0.01% Chelated Copper (Cu)
Iron (Fe) 0.20%
0.20% Chelated Iron (Fe)
Manganese (Mn) 0.06%
0.06% Chelated Manganese
Molybdenum (Mo) 0.01%
Zinc (Zn) 0.02%
0.02% Chelated Zinc
